channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Subversion Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Subversion Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-29046|2024-08-03T06:10:58.937Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Plugin 2.15.3 and earlier does not escape the name and description of List Subversion tags (and more) parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-29048|2024-08-03T06:10:58.450Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Plugin 2.15.3 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL.
